reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, well-made, and appreciate its length and style, with one noting it can be dressed up or down. The dress is soft and features pockets, and customers like the pattern and colors. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it's not great. The dress's clinginess is also mixed, with several customers noting the skirt is clingy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress ever! It has pockets.
items.body: Super soft. Beautiful print ..not that cheap poly from China crap...this is a soft, stretchy material. I was worried about it being thin and see thru ..it was not! Fit as described. Very flattering on. Almost 6 ft tall and perfect. Can be dressed up or dressed down. You could add a belt or ribbon. Super fast shipping! Read more
items.author: thomas mills

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A huge WIN for my plus size baddies!!!
items.body: I ordered this dress and three others in a desperate last ditch effort for a wedding. I usually do not order clothes online because as a plus size girly it just never works in my favor. However, this dress fit perfect. Itâ€™s not usually my style of dress, but I was blown away by how comfortable it is. I am 5â€™4 around 213 pounds. The dress does touch the floor, but itâ€™s not dragging. You may want a slight platform/heel, but nothing crazy. Itâ€™s super stretchy. I probably could have sized down, but it hugs my curves and leaves a little wiggle room. I will say if you have a smaller chest, you may want to size down though. Bigger chested girlies, this absolutely has enough room! The sleeves fit, but arenâ€™t tight! THIS DRESS HAS POCKETS! Itâ€™s perfect for a wedding! I contemplated wearing shape wear, but Iâ€™ll be fine if I donâ€™t. I am super bloated due to a recent abdominal surgery and the pattern hides that well. I am just super happy that this fit and the price point is good. I would be careful washing because it absolutely has potential to shrink! Itâ€™s not state of the art material, but my fears of not finding a dress are all gone and Iâ€™m super happy. Even if it only gets me through wedding tomorrow it absolutely was worth the price! An absolute win for my plus size baddies!!! Read more
items.author: Sierra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Buy!
items.body: True to size. Very comfortable. Would buy again. Great value for the price. Has brought my style game up a few notches. I love it has pockets. Read more
items.author: C. Benson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love these dresses!
items.body: I'm giving this 4 stars because I have several of these dresses and I love the fit, style, and material. I am returning this one, however, because in person I don't like it nearly as much as the photo. I love purple and green and thought it looked very pretty in the photos, but in person it looks gaudy and old-ladyish. Read more
items.author: mskraus2u

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress ever!!
items.body: Oh my goodness. I love these dresses! Have two of them now and will order more. Very comfy. Washes up nicely. I ordered a size up as I need a loose fit due to health issues. The dress is very long so I clip up the hem on one side so it doesn't drag on the floor. The sleeves are very long also and I just use two hair bands on my wrists to create a ruffled edge. I'd sew them up but, to be honest, I'm quite lazy. I bought this dress as it'll be warm this winter to wear in house. Very happy with my purchase and the dress looks super cute on even on a plus size granny like me. I found the price reasonable for such a good quality dress. Read more
items.author: Mango Momma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Dress looks Better with an 18 hour Bra with Good Lift
items.body: The material is nice 'n soft, the dark green color is so rich in the snake print; the 3X fit well and the length is right. The kind of bra one wears makes a difference; because with a low hanging rounded bra, the dress could make one look heavier (like over-sized cow utters). But with a lifting bra with definition, the waistline shows more, making the dress look more slenderizing. This kind of dress looks better with crisp shoulder pads, drawing more attention to the contour of the waist, rather than the frumpiness of round heavy shoulders (and big upper arms). Pictures will follow in a week, or so. Read more
items.author: Pats2cents YouTube

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very long and skirt clingy
items.body: Fabric was very clingy â€¦ ordered 3x my normal size should have gone 1-2 up to no have it cling to every curve. Length was awesome - Iâ€™m 5 ft 11 and it went to ankles and all the way down on sleeves to hands. Very long. Top area fit well , bottom of empire waist it just clung like a night gown. A slip (do they make those anymore) might have helped or a dress lining. Read more
items.author: TG Gleason

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and feminine
items.body: Just because I have a â€œmaxiâ€ body, it doesnâ€™t mean I want to look like it! Soft, stretchy and feminine Read more
items.author: KAT

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Aoyagi, Blue Rose, Peony Purple, Black, Gradient Flower, Black Begonia Flower, Purple Flower, Dark Blue Snake Skin, Zebra Leopard Prints, Black Blue Leaves, Royal Blue, Five Blue Flowers, Blue Print, Blue Begonia. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
